<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Manages regional EC2 instance metadata default settings.
More information can be found in the [Configure instance metadata options for new instances](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/configuring-IMDS-new-instances.html) user guide.

## Example Usage

</div>

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const enforce_imdsv2 = new aws.ec2.InstanceMetadataDefaults("enforce-imdsv2", {
    httpTokens: "required",
    httpPutResponseHopLimit: 1,
});
```
</pulumi-choosable>

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v6/go/aws/ec2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := ec2.NewInstanceMetadataDefaults(ctx, "enforce-imdsv2", &ec2.InstanceMetadataDefaultsArgs{
			HttpTokens:              pulumi.String("required"),
			HttpPutResponseHopLimit: pulumi.Int(1),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

## InstanceMetadataDefaults Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<p>
In Python, inputs that are objects can be passed either as <a href="/docs/languages-sdks/python/#inputs-and-outputs">argument classes or as dictionary literals</a>.
</p>
</pulumi-choosable>

The InstanceMetadataDefaults resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="httpendpoint_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#httpendpoint_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Http<wbr>Endpoint</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether the metadata service is available. Can be <code>&quot;enabled&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;disabled&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>. Default: <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="httpputresponsehoplimit_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#httpputresponsehoplimit_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Http<wbr>Put<wbr>Response<wbr>Hop<wbr>Limit</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The desired HTTP PUT response hop limit for instance metadata requests. The larger the number, the further instance metadata requests can travel. Can be an integer from <code>1</code> to <code>64</code>, or <code>-1</code> to indicate no preference. Default: <code>-1</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="httptokens_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#httptokens_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Http<wbr>Tokens</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether the metadata service requires session tokens, also referred to as <em>Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2)</em>. Can be <code>&quot;optional&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;required&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>. Default: <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="instancemetadatatags_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#instancemetadatatags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Instance<wbr>Metadata<wbr>Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Enables or disables access to instance tags from the instance metadata service. Can be <code>&quot;enabled&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;disabled&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>. Default: <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>

Can be an integer from <code>1</code> to <code>64</code>, or <code>-1</code> to indicate no preference. Default: <code>-1</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#httpputresponsehoplimit_java" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">http<wbr>Put<wbr>Response<wbr>Hop<wbr>Limit</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Integer</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The desired HTTP PUT response hop limit for instance metadata requests. The larger the number, the further instance metadata requests can travel. Can be an integer from <code>1</code> to <code>64</code>, or <code>-1</code> to indicate no preference. Default: <code>-1</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="httptokens_java">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether the metadata service requires session tokens, also referred to as <em>Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2)</em>. Can be <code>&quot;optional&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;required&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>. Default: <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

</pulumi-choosable>

        <span id="state_httpendpoint_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_httpendpoint_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Http<wbr>Endpoint</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether the metadata service is available. Can be <code>&quot;enabled&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;disabled&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>. Default: <code>&quot;no-preference&quot;</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The desired HTTP PUT response hop limit for instance metadata requests. The larger the number, the further instance metadata requests can travel.             title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
